cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT).S E C R E T. CABINET. PRACTICE RANGE FOR ARMOURED FIGHTING VEHICLES. Note by the Secretary. In pursuance of Cabinet 2 (39) Conclusion 8, the PrimeMinister, after consultation with the Minister for Co-ordinationof Defence, the Secretary of State for War and the Ministerof Health, has decided that he cannot refuse his assent to theLinney Head site. The Secretary of State for War has been informed of thePrime Minister's decision.CP. 39 (39).COPY HO. Lf 3-(Signed) S.E. BRIDGES,Secretary, Cabinet.Richmond Terrace,S.W.T.February 3rd, 1939.
